00007 {
00009 
00021   template <class T, class I> class factory
00022   {
00023   public:
00025 
00028     static T * create()
00029     {
00030       return static_cast<T*>(new I());
00031     }
00032   };
00033 
00035 
00043   template <class T, class I, class F> class factory_with_initializer
00044   {
00045   public:
00047 
00051     static T * create()
00052     {
00053       return F()(static_cast<T*>(new I()));
00054     }
00055   };
00056 };
